turns.user_message: Hello, I am looking for a place to stay that has free parking in the South area. Can you help me with that please?
turns.agent_response: I have four options ranging in price from cheap to expensive ranging in from 3 to 4 stars.
turns.reasoning: First turn - user asks about accommodation in South area with parking. This is Goal 1 (Hotel/Accommodation).

turns.agent_response: Yes I have 3 guesthouses matching your criteria. Would you like to book one of them?
turns.reasoning: Follow-up question about same accommodation goal, asking about guesthouses specifically.

turns.user_message: No I just need you to recommend one for me.
turns.agent_response: Aylesbury odge guesthouse,I will book it for you,is there anything else I can do for you ?
turns.reasoning: Same accommodation goal. Agent misunderstands - offers to book when user only wanted recommendation.

turns.user_message: I don't need you to book it, I just need the phone number and post code please.
turns.agent_response: The phone number is 01223240089, and the post code is cb17sr. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
turns.reasoning: Same accommodation goal - user asking for specific details about the guesthouse.

turns.user_message: Thanks, also looking for a restaurant in the same part of town in the expensive range. Can you recommend one?
turns.agent_response: the good luck chinese food takeaway is great. Shall i book it ?
turns.reasoning: New Goal 2 (Restaurant) - user switches to finding expensive restaurant. Agent recommends takeaway instead of proper restaurant.

turns.user_message: Please book the restaurant and I also need a taxi.
turns.agent_response: What time would you like to dine, and how many will be in your party?
turns.reasoning: Contains two goals: Continuing Goal 2 (Restaurant booking) and introduces Goal 3 (Taxi request).

turns.user_message: There will be 6 of us. We'd like 12:15 on Saturday please.
turns.agent_response: Your table is booked (ref# SCHAG4OI). What time do you need that taxi?
turns.reasoning: Continuing restaurant booking goal - providing booking details.

turns.user_message: I'd like it to arrive in time to get us there before 12:15.
turns.agent_response: Your black ford taxi has been booked and your contact number is 07103139053.
turns.reasoning: Addressing Goal 3 (Taxi) - specifying taxi timing requirements.

turns.user_message: Thanks. That is all for now.
turns.agent_response: Okay.  Please call us if we can help you further.  We hope you enjoy your stay.
